text: alt=A female holding a microphone singing while facing to the left|thumb|Katy Perry performing in 2017 This is a list of songs recorded by American singer Katy Perry. ==Songs== Key Means a song written by Katy Perry only *Note: "Use Your Love" is largely a cover of "Your Love" by The Outfield and written by John Spinks.
